headline: Most recent comments are true
pros: Dental and Vision is free but not worth the poor corporate culture.
cons:
Poor corporate culture
Make you work federal holidays
Low pay compare to other institutions

headline: I really tried to like this company but is bad .
pros:
Free dental, vision but only amounts to maybe $10 per pay check. Still not worth working here.
Nothing else.
cons:
Work life balance is terrible
Head of HR is incompetent.
No management/leadership
Company has no sense of direction.
Poor pay compare to other credit unions or banking industry
Makes you work on Federal Holidays.

headline: New leadership needed
pros: I had a great team and loved the work.
cons: No leadership at the top of the organization. Extremely low morale. Choices made during the pandemic revealed exactly how little executive management thinks of the staff.

headline: Good company
cons: None - good company to work for

headline: Work
cons:
Very old school
Upper management sucks

headline: It's was OK
cons: Hard commute to east side ofDowntown

headline: Great place to work
pros:
Great benefits
Growth opportunity for some but not all
Easy commute 
Open door policy
Keeps employees in the loop on all decisions made
Values employees
Ongoing training
cons:
Low pay
Some departments will never allow for growth or promotions 
High turnover rate

headline: Good if you would like to provide free labor
pros: Community, friendly, plenty of work to go around
cons:
The work never stops, seriously!
Most people who are around have been there for 5, 10, even 20 years though they are lacking experience in the departments they manage or head.

Lots of talking and great ideas, however thats all there is, talking.... no actual progress is done to the benefit of the credit union unless it is the absolute minimum to get projects or assignments done on time after their scheduled complement date.

Expect for tons of work, not only durring your working hours, but this company also expects for you to volunteer for numerous events throughout the year, and if you dont, you will get a bad review and not receive your bonus or a raise.
